author: nieldakarla
message: fix(curriculum): QA A1 Chinese Ch 2 blocks Nasal Sounds, Special Characters and Practice (#64761)

@@ -30,3 +30,51 @@ This syllable combines the initial `n` with the final `eng`, and uses the second
